expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Mode B: Analyze (full mode with fixes) based on 'analyze' keyword
Agent performs model-class detection from prompt content or asks the user
Agent produces diagnostic scorecard on 5 dimensions (Clarity, Completeness, Efficiency, Robustness, Model Fit) scored 1-5
Agent applies four-lens analysis (Ambiguity, Security, Robustness, Efficiency)
Agent runs anti-pattern scan against references/anti-patterns.md
Agent proposes targeted fixes for dimensions scoring below 4 with before/after diffs
Agent recommends Mode D (Evaluate) if no eval exists
